div.p: makealerts creates alerts from piped events. Syntax:
div.pre: makealerts time=fieldname entity=fieldname type=string severity=fieldname idfield=fieldname combine="comma separated fieldnames" combine_window=duration_spec
div.p: This will insert alerts as records in the alerts kv store. All non-internal fields are saved. If an alert with same event time and the same field values already exists, then it will not be inserted.

ul.li: time is optional and defaults to the _time field
entity is optional and defaults to the entity field
severity is an optional field name
idfield is an optional field that will received the auto generated key from the alert kv insert operation

combine and combine_window are optional fields to prevent multiple alerts by combining subsequent alerts with identical values for some fields within a time window:
combine is a list of comma separated field names enclosed in double quotes
combine_window is a string to indicate a number of hours or days with the following format number[d|h] such as 1d or 12h

div.pre: ... | makealerts time=_time entity=user type="My Type" ... | makealerts time=_time entity=user type="My Type" combine="host,user,clientip,destip" combine_window=24h
